extendedInfo.description: Outrun the law as a Racer in supercars like the Pagani Zonda Cinque â or stop racers cold as a Cop in high-speed police interceptors like the Lamborghini Reventon. Experience pulse-pounding action as you make the escape â or make the bust â with Need for Speed Hot Pursuitâ¢ on Android.CHASE ACHIEVEMENTSDrive up to 20 precision-performance cars in adrenaline-fueled showdowns across 24 day-and-night tracks. Take it to the limit in 48 total Cop and Racer Career Events, collect bounty, and rise to the top of the ranks. DUEL IT OUT ON THE ROAD As a Cop, lay down the law with roadblocks and spike strips â or fry the Racerâs electrical system with an EMP lock. As a Racer, make the getaway with overdrive, jamming, and oil slicks. Duel it out on the road!  From the #1 interactive racing franchise, bring the heat with Need for Speed Hot Pursuit!Discover more games from EA like TetrisÂ® free and SimCityâ¢ Deluxe, and THE GAME OF LIFE. See all our games for Android now!Â Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips, and more!VISIT US: http://www.ea.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesEnd User License Agreement: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/Android/

reviews.title: Xperia Play
reviews.comment: Hours of fun for car lovers. But the R shoulder button (gas) will be loosen up when your through with it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I\'ve played many racers on Android and this one has become my favorite instantly. Finally EA met my expectations instead of falling way short. The game is beautiful and challenging. Runs smoothly on my Galaxy S.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Say what ??
reviews.comment: No multiplayer ?? No updates for a multiplayer ?? Only 100,000 downloads. No talks of Most Wanted coming to android ?? You should put it on the android platform to tribute the series, and because Most Wanted for consoles is coming out. You know, like how Rockstar put GTA on android. Don\'t say it can\'t be done, cause the technology is there. Anywho...No  Multiplayer...shame on you, all of you. Ohh but you added new languages, but no new features. I wanna support the dev\'s, but you should give us all a reason
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5002 Error
reviews.comment: Downloaded app and I also get a 5002 error.   EA\'s site is garbage as it doesn\'t clearly offer any information on how I am supposed to fix it.   As this app was only $.49 today it was a pretty low cost reminder not to buy games from EA Mobile.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Fun way to pass the time! No crashing,no bugs no errors of any kind. 5* And I did update. People must be usings ICS, it sucks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Whoah!!!!!
reviews.comment: BEST BEST BEST BEST RACING GAME OUT THERE!  EVEN BEYER THEN MY ipod VERSION ON MY LARGE DROID X SCREEN! SIMPLY BEAUTIFUL AND AT 0.49\302\242! GET IT!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Server error. Don\'t buy it
reviews.comment: Server error 5002. Contact EA, said my issue will be sent to special team and I will be responded in a week. Over a week I haven\'t got a word from them. Don\'t buy this game until you read people say it work. Google store should remove it until it actually work. They ripped off alot people so far
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No play, no game and they kept my money!
reviews.comment: Did not work from the first try. Did not get a responce from the developer !  Another useless app I payed for! Update, now the android market says this app is not compatible with my device and now will not let me even download it again. Did I not pay good money for this game I have never played. Why will no one give me my money back and now they are not letting me download what I purchased.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs 300mb additional download. Makes returning it impossible if you dont like it.\tThe gamss beautifully designed,  but with a required 300mb download,  you wull not be able to tell if you like it or not until after the return period is over. Well played EA,  well played. Ill just go download the apk for free elsewhere.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but dosent support hardware controls
reviews.comment: Got a tablet with dpads, analog stick, lots of buttons and on this game they are all useless. Some games like riptide do support tilt, touch or hardware. Too bad this game dosent, it\'s tilt only with touch gas and brake. If it supported hardware controls I would give 5 stars. If your going to be playing this on like a plane or buss, you cant be tilting your tablet all over.
reviews.author: chris trent

reviews.title: Tilt steering sucks, add touch controls
reviews.comment: Love the graphics and gameplay, but I wish there was an option to steer by touch as well, rather than tilt only steering. If this was fixed, it would be the best racing game on Android.  But, at the moment Asphalt 6 dominates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I also have the Windows version and this is almost as good.  It runs smoothly on my Nexus 7 but that was to be expected. Excellent\tI also have the Windows version and this is almost as good.  It runs smoothly on my Nexus 7 but that was to be expected.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wont donload
reviews.comment: Cant download past 90% just crashes. Would love to play  i cant. Will never pay full price for an ea game. Nothing but problems. Asus  ics transformer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Size not accurate
reviews.comment: In Play store size:8MB Upon opening app, you are required to download another 300 MB worth of content.  False advertisement
reviews.author: laura Ellen

reviews.title: Great deal!!!
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 - For the mere price if $0.49 there isn\'t a whole lot of room to complain. Downloaded and installed, played 4 missions to make sure it worked. Game play is pretty simple to use, overall a great game especially for the price. Grab it while u still can!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: poor controls, poor game play
reviews.comment: This game has bizzare and unclear boundaries as well as lack if alternate controls aside of using the gyroscope.  Not particularly fun nor worth even the 50\302\242 I paid for it.  If you want a racing game try the asphalt series.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Don\'t let the rating fool you, this is a 5 star game.  Its just as fun as the original Hot Pursuit (NFS III).  Good job on breathing life back into the NFS series EA!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game!
reviews.comment: Of course I don\'t expect it to match the video game consoles but for playing on a smartphone, it has left me quite impressed and it\'s actually fun, too! I couldn\'t resist it for only $0.49. I had no issues downloading nor installing. It plays flawlessly on my Samsung Nexus S 4G.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Do not buy!
reviews.comment: I bought this app and it doesnt even open. I want a refund back. What is wrong with games now a days not working. Samsung GalaxyDroid-_-
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Server error
reviews.comment: Keep getting server error when after starting game it wants to download 300 mb. Fine but server error every time. I hate being ripped off. Effing BS give me my money back.
reviews.author: A Google User
